title: Seerling’s Visual Archives Art Contest Entries
content:
++ **Hello! This is Seerling!**
And this is two of my entries for Visual Archive Art Contest!
My entries are SCP-085 - Cassy, falling under Classic SCPs and SCP-4999 - Someone to Watch Over, falling under old SCPs

[[tabview]]
[[tab SCP-085]]
[[image https://art.ngfiles.com/images/5660000/5660001_737806_asylumdisorder_visual-archives-art-contest-entries.9b72263719164abd42272e10ecfc7811.webp?f1714522924]]
--
[[collapsible show="Mmh? What’s this?" hide="- Oh well"]]
The second one is the explanation (justification) for the Cassy’s questionable sitting position. Her left arm is straight as her right arm is holding it. Sorry if this looks shit, I’m using my finger
[[image https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/614183224629002242/1234569876648099871/IMG_4295.jpg?ex=6631364b&is=662fe4cb&hm=90ea731ace50653879ef6721997fa70197c0110bb12febebbe1cb4c0ab9b11cf&]]
[[/collapsible]]
[[/tab]]
[[tab SCP-4999]]
[[image https://art.ngfiles.com/images/5660000/5660001_737807_asylumdisorder_visual-archives-art-contest-entries.9b72263719164abd42272e10ecfc7811.webp?f1714522926]]
--
This is a remake on my old stupid comic about it which is inspired by a random comment.
[[/tab]]
[[tab SCP-8247]]
[[image https://art.ngfiles.com/images/5660000/5660001_737805_asylumdisorder_visual-archives-art-contest-entries.9b72263719164abd42272e10ecfc7811.webp?f1714522922]]
--
I was planning on making a tiger shadow of a cat or a comparison meme, but my finger won’t let me draw a tiger properly, so I resorted to this.
[[/tab]]
[[/tabview]]
author: Shirley Sterling
